text: @DineshDSouza Sorry, That Bitch needs to get pushed back!  When someone invades your space you have a right to defend it!  No one has the right to infringe on someone else's Rights! Just when was this photo taken?  No Masks!  Coronavirus?  Staged? Propaganda?
